solution_line_template: First find the total time Bill spends chopping peppers: {num_peppers} peppers * {minutes_per_pepper} minutes/pepper = <<{num_peppers}*{minutes_per_pepper}={pepper_time}>>{pepper_time} minutes
Then find the total time Bill spends chopping onions: {num_onions} onions * {minutes_per_onion} minutes/onion = <<{num_onions}*{minutes_per_onion}={onion_time}>>{onion_time} minutes

Then find the combined time to grate cheese for and cook each omelet: {minutes_to_cook}+{minutes_to_grate_cheese} minute/omelet = <<{minutes_to_cook}+{minutes_to_grate_cheese}={time_per_omelet}>>{time_per_omelet} minutes

Then multiply the time per omelet by the number of omelets: {num_omelets} omelets * {time_per_omelet} minutes/omelet = <<{num_omelets}*{time_per_omelet}={total_omelet_time}>>{total_omelet_time} minutes

Then add the cook time to the chopping time to find the total time Bill spends: {total_omelet_time} minutes + {pepper_time} minutes + {onion_time} minutes = <<{total_omelet_time}+{pepper_time}+{onion_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes
